Package physic

Interface IHitbox

All Known Implementing Classes:
RectangularHitbox
public interface IHitbox
Interface representing a hitbox.

    • intersects

      boolean intersects(IHitbox hitBox)
      Check if the hitbox intersect the a foreign hitbox in argument.
      Parameters:
      hitBox - -> the foreign hitbox to check with
      Returns:
      true if the hitbox intersect the foreign hitbox in argument. Return false otherwise
